TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EmbeddedMailObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示嵌入使用 類別所建構之電子郵件訊息的項目。

span.span: Represents an item to embed in an email message constructed using the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 表示要嵌入郵件訊息中的項目。The represents an item to embed in a mail message. 這些內嵌的項目可以是影像檔案，例如公司標誌。These embedded items can be image files such as company logos. 每個內嵌的項目指定識別項和路徑。Each embedded item is specified by an identifier and a path. 若要確保電子郵件訊息檔案內內嵌的物件會正確顯示，必須符合下列條件：To ensure that an embedded object is displayed correctly within the email message file, the following conditions must be met: - 郵件訊息的 HTML 格式。The mail message is in HTML format. - 項目是映像檔案 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等等）。The item is an image file (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on). - 中指定的 HTML 格式的主體檔案屬性包含參考映像檔案，使用下列語法：The HTML-formatted body file specified in the property contains a reference to the image file using the following syntax: ``` . ``` 如果會新增至郵件訊息，並無法滿足所有先前指定的需求，它將最有可能會顯示為 mail 郵件的附件。If an is added to a mail message and does not fulfill all of the requirements specified previously, it will most likely be displayed as an attachment in the mail message. 如果項目參考的郵件訊息中的識別項，但不是包含內嵌的項目，它會顯示為毀損的附件檢視郵件時。If an item is referenced by an identifier in the mail message but not included as an embedded item, it will appear as a broken attachment when the mail is viewed. 會儲存一組的單一電子郵件訊息的物件。The stores a collection of objects for a single mail message. 由屬性物件來建立電子郵件訊息。The is used by the property of the object to create the mail message. 允許的內嵌的物件的郵件會藉由設定可在下列的 Web 控制項中設定其屬性以宣告方式：Mail messages that allow embedded objects are configurable in the following Web controls by setting their properties declaratively: - - - > [!NOTE] > 中的值和物件不會儲存在檢視狀態。The values in the and objects are not stored in view state. 這可防止惡意使用者探索您的伺服器的路徑資訊。This protects against malicious users discovering path information for your server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功中的程式碼`SendingMail`事件處理常式會嘗試傳送電子郵件給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 為了讓這個程式碼範例，才能在伺服器上必須已經設定 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如上述範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得或設定內嵌項目的識別碼，使用屬性。To get or set the identifier of the embedded item, use the property. 取得或設定路徑為內嵌的項目，請使用屬性。To get or set the path to the embedded item, use the property. 這兩個屬性必須設定為成功嵌入郵件訊息中的 項目。Both properties must be set to successfully embed the item in the mail message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string path) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, path As String)

param.name: name
param.span: 做為要嵌入郵件訊息中之項目識別項的名稱。

span.span: The name used as the identifier of the item to embed in the mail message.

param.name: path
param.span: 用來擷取要嵌入郵件訊息中之項目的路徑。

span.span: The path used to retrieve an item to embed in the mail message.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並使用指定的識別項名稱及路徑填入物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified identifier name and path to populate the object.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用 ASP.NET 網頁的程式碼後置範例控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example shows a code-behind example of an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 此程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。This code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功中的程式碼`SendingMail`事件處理常式會嘗試傳送電子郵件給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 為了讓這個程式碼範例，才能在伺服器上必須已經設定 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用.aspx 頁面。The following code example demonstrates using an .aspx page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用程式碼後置檔案。The following code example demonstrates using a code-behind file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/CS/changepassword.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword/VB/changepassword.vb#2)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如上述範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件訊息中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in an email message is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要用為嵌入在以 類別建構之郵件訊息中的項目識別項名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that is used as the identifier of the item to be embedded in a mail message constructed with the class.

value.span: 傳回要嵌入郵件訊息中的項目識別項。

span.span: Returns the identifier of the item to embed in a mail message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性會指定要嵌入郵件訊息，以宣告方式建構的項目識別碼類別。The property specifies an identifier for an item to embed in a mail message constructed declaratively with the class. 識別碼用來對應中包含的項目屬性，其主體中指定的檔案中的適當位置屬性，使用下列語法：The identifier is used to map the item contained in the property to its appropriate location in the body of the file specified in the property, using the following syntax: ``` ``` 一般而言，項目是影像檔。Typically, the item is an image file. 預設值為屬性為空字串。The default for the property is an empty string. 它是設定在您的郵件訊息的任何內嵌的影像的替代文字屬性的協助工具設計的最佳作法。It is a best practice for accessibility design to set the alternate text property in your mail message for any embedded images. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功中的程式碼`SendingMail`事件處理常式會嘗試傳送電子郵件給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 為了讓這個程式碼範例，才能在伺服器上必須已經設定 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如上述範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件訊息中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in an email message is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來擷取要嵌入以 類別建構之郵件訊息的項目路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path that is used to retrieve an item to embed in a mail message constructed with the class.

value.span: 傳回要嵌入郵件訊息中的項目路徑。

span.span: Returns the path to the item to embed in a mail message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性會指定您想要嵌入郵件訊息，以宣告方式建構的項目路徑物件。The property specifies the path to the item you want to embed in the mail message constructed declaratively with the object. 中的檔案路徑必須是路徑，例如 C:\MyServer\Banner.gif。The file path in must be a path such as C:\MyServer\Banner.gif. 一般而言，內嵌的項目是影像檔。Typically, the embedded item is an image file. 如果映像檔是依照其郵件訊息中的識別碼來參考，但不是包含在訊息中，檢視電子郵件訊息時的映像會顯示為毀損的附件。If an image file is referenced by its identifier in the mail message but not included in the message, the image appears as a broken attachment when the email message is viewed. 它是設定在您的郵件訊息的任何內嵌的影像的替代文字屬性的協助工具設計的最佳作法。It is a best practice for accessibility design to set the alternate text property in your mail message for any embedded images. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件，名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 在程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知其名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功中的程式碼`SendingMail`事件處理常式會嘗試傳送電子郵件給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code in the `SendingMail` event handler attempts to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 為了讓這個程式碼範例，才能在伺服器上必須已經設定 SMTP。SMTP must already be configured on the server in order for this code example to work. 如需有關如何設定 SMTP 伺服器的資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 如何： 安裝和設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例的目的，它不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器;範例會建構要傳送電子郵件訊息的失敗測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他某些錯誤，就會發生，而且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，假設事件來源名為 MySamplesSite 已經存在於 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔記錄事件。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 請參閱程式碼範例來建立指定的事件來源。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 的屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您要以程式設計方式加入事件來源名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 此事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例才能正確運作的順序。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可用來當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如上述範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the preceding example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件訊息中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in an email message is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可由 「 探查 」 應用程式的特殊網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 若要提高安全性，使用 緩和措施中所述[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

Your password for the account named "<%Username%>" has changed.

If you did not initiate this change, please call 1-206-555-0100.

Please read our attached Privacy Notice.

```
